ISSUE.TITLE: Failed to connect backend if hosting frontend and backend separately
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Supposing hosting the frontend and backend separately is required. Steps to reproduce: 1. open cmd 1 2. cd packages/nc-gui 3. run ``npm i`` 4. run ``npm run build`` so that the files will be built under ``dist/`` 5. open cmd 2 6. cd packages/nocodb 7. run ``npm i`` 8. run ``npm run watch:run`` ``` App started successfully. Visit -> http://localhost:8080/dashboard ``` 9. after backend is started successfully, go back to cmd1 and run ``http-server -p 3000 .`` ``` Starting up http-server, serving . Available on: http://172.16.12.115:3000 http://127.0.0.1:3000 http://172.22.80.1:3000 http://172.17.65.113:3000 ``` 10. access http://172.17.65.113:3000 in browser 11. Open DevTools and found the following errors ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35857179/121493804-c182f180-ca0a-11eb-92f7-5661766d3dd7.png) The request URL is ``http://172.17.65.113:3000/?q=sqlOp_xcPluginRead`` Note: I changed ``../`` to ``http://localhost:8080/`` in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/blob/master/packages/nc-gui/nuxt.config.js#L102 and it still doesn't work. Somehow it is still accessing port 3000.
